title: Basic Usage
content: uses v-model to set the initial activated tab page. The bound value corresponds to the value of the name attribute in the tiny-tab-item element. A tiny-tab-item is a tab. You can use the title attribute to set the tab title.
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: card type
content: Use tab-style to set the tab style type and active-name to set the initially activated tab.
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: bordercard type
content: Use tab-style to set the tab style type to bordercard.
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: The tab page can be added.
content: Set the with-add attribute to enable tags to add functions. In addition, the add event is used to customize the logic for adding tabs. After the show-more-tabs attribute is configured, the More button is displayed when the tab page exceeds a certain width.
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: The tab page can be closed.
content: The withClose attribute specifies whether the tab page can be closed. In addition, the close event can be used to customize the logic for closing the tab page.
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: top display position
content: Set the display position of the tab page through the position attribute. The options are top, right, bottom, and left. The default value is top.
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: Event Before Leaving
content:
The hook function before

before-leave switches the label. If false or Promise is returned and rejected, the switchover is blocked. If true is returned, the switchover is allowed.
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: Automatically open
content:
The

stretch property specifies whether the width of a label is self-expanded. The default value is false.
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: add event
content: The add event is triggered when the Add button is clicked to add a tab page
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: click event
content: The click event is triggered when a tab page is clicked
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: close event
content: The close event is triggered when a tab page is closed
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: edit Event
content: The edit event is triggered after you click Add to add a tab page or the tab page is closed
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: Custom Tab Title
content: Customize the title of the tab page through the title slot of the tiny-tab-item, for example, add an icon before the title.
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: Creating tab pages cyclically
content: Creates multiple tiny-tab-items based on the data loop through v-for.
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.

title: Switching a tab page to a grid
content:
Using the Grid component in the

Tabs component requires the Grid to set the :auto-resize="true" property so that the Grid can adapt to changes in the parent element.
findIntroStr: Separates data sets that are associated with content but belong to different categories.
